sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>commander</radical> who's <radical>big</radical> will use his size to <kanji>encourage</kanji> his troops.
meaningInfo: "Look at me! You can be a big commander someday too!" he shouts, encouraging everyone.
readingMnemonic: He <kanji>encourage</kanji>s the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>) too! You've never seen the Shougun express any emotion other than intense indifference or intense dislike.
readingInfo: Picture the encouraged Shougun: his eyes are shining with tears, his heart is pounding, he's been encouraged to be better!
